scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n web,admin -c green,blue "pnpm -C apps/web dev" "pnpm -C apps/admin dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/admin build
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n web,admin -c green,blue "pnpm -C apps/web start -p 3000" "pnpm -C apps/admin start -p 3001"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm -C packages/db prisma migrate dev --name init
